title: docker image vulnerabilites
body:

```
Major upgrades
Base Image      Vulnerabilities  Severity
debian:11-slim  35               1 critical, 0 high, 1 medium, 33 low
```

Docker recomends to upgrade to base image `debian:11-slim` but still brings 1 critical vulnerability. 

Alternatively lighthouse could using alpine as base image.

Thanks for raising. We've been slow here since we don't understand that these vulnerabilities affect Lighthouse in a tangible way. 

I've raised #2862 to update the base image to Bullseye (11). It's the stable version now, so I think it makes all-round sense to update.
Closed by #2862 (although we are still waiting on a release)
